europeana:record.dc:title: A new genus of Tetratermini (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Lysiterminae) parasitic on grasshoppers (Gryllacrididae)
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Achterberg, van C.
Steiner H.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Hymenoptera; Braconidae; Lysiterminae; Tetratermini; Katytermus; Platyrmus; Tetratermus; Gryllacrididae; Oriental; Australian; key
europeana:record.dc:description: The new genus Katytermus from Malaysia (type species: Katytermus palmicola spec. nov.) is described and illustrated. The new genus belongs to a new tribe, Tetratermini, of the subfamily Lysiterminae. The type species has been reared as a gregarious endoparasite of a "katydid" longhorn grasshopper (Gryllacrididae).
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: A new genus of Tetratermini (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Lysiterminae) parasitic on grasshoppers (Gryllacrididae) (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 70) (Issue 17)
